testimonial: Adopting from Bark Avenue Orphanage was a pawsome decision! I've been writing the best tails ever since!
Thanks to Bark Avenue, I've upgraded my humans to professional belly-rubbers. Best decision ever!
Since joining my new family from Bark Avenue, I've turned their lives upside down... in the best, tail-wagging way possible!
Bark Avenue Orphanage introduced me to my new humans. Now, I make sure they never sleep past 6 AM. You're welcome!
I found my forever home at Bark Avenue, and now I cover the house in fur and love. Mostly fur, but also a lot of love!
Thanks to Bark Avenue, I've mastered the art of looking innocent while being mischievous. My humans can't stay mad at my face!
Who knew adopting me from Bark Avenue would mean my humans would have a permanent sock thief? They wouldn't trade me for anything!
Thanks to Bark Avenue, I've discovered that shoes taste amazing! I've given them rave reviews (and bite marks)!
I have my new humans wrapped around my paw, thanks to Bark Avenue. They're happy servants to my royal fluffiness!
Bark Avenue Orphanage helped me find my forever family. Turns out, they needed a very energetic, tail-wagging piece like me!
